Wirelessgames.com is proud to announce its first project with role-playing veteran Steve Jackson to develop a fantasy adventure game for WAP phones based on his 'Sorcery' adventure gamebooks.

The Sorcery project is based on Jackson's award-winning interactive gamebook series, originally published in the UK by Penguin Books. Sorcery has since been licensed to publishers in 15 countries around the world and has sold over a million copies to date.
